com.mslab.encryptsms.misc

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mslab.encryptsms.misc.DatabaseController

  • public class DatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controlls all action with the database. It should be used only from a helper class.
    Author:
    Paul Kramer

        public java.lang.String getSecondDatabasePath()
        Gets a path to a backup database.

        The path to a backup database.

      • open

        public net.sqlcipher.database.SQLiteDatabase open(java.lang.String password)
        Opens a database or if no database exists, it creates one.
        Parameters:
        password - The password of the database.
        Returns:
        The database.

      • close

        public void close()
        After every open call, a close call should follow to prevent the database from errors.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Checks if the database is open.
        Returns:
        True if it is open, false otherwise.

      • changeKey

        public void changeKey(byte[] newPassword)
        This method changes the database password. It can not be undone, do not loose the key!
        Parameters:
        newPassword - The new password.
